TorrentMetadata

Class TorrentFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • TorrentMetadata.TorrentFile

  • public class TorrentFile
extends java.lang.Object

    This class keps torrent information is created from the byte array made from .torrent

    • Field Detail

      • pieceLength

        public static final int pieceLength
        Number of bytes in each piece (integer). pieceLength maps to the number of bytes in each piece the file is split into. For the purposes of transfer, files are split into fixed-size pieces which are all the same length except for possibly the last one which may be truncated. piece length is almost always a power of two, most commonly 2 18 = 256 K (BitTorrent prior to version 3.2 uses 2 20 = 1 M as default).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • pieceHashSize

        public static final int pieceHashSize
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
